## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G08030](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G08030)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AthA2-1</u>
- **Gene Name:** 
- **Description:**   DNA-directed RNA polymerase subunit beta (Protein of unknown function, DUF642);(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2077467
